channel.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)
channel.description:
Alright so my buddy has got a buddy with a Server company which sells Source Game Servers (CS:S, HL@DM, ETC.) and he is willing to give me some space for my RSPS. Of course I need to give him some details on what my server will take up for bandwidth. I was hoping one would be able to give me a rough estimate on how much bandwidth one player takes up so that I can get a quote on a per player basis. Thanks in advance. EDIT : I do not know much about networking/dedis/etc. He says he needs to know the server load here is a message from him in steam
8:31 PM - xTcR | Kuro 黒: bandwidth is meeningless 8:31 PM - xTcR | Kuro 黒: its all about server load

item.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

The amount of RAM doesn’t effect the amount of players by much, bandwidth is what you really need to worry about, 100gb bandwidth may hold around 60 players. 1 GB Dedicated RAM will hold far more than 45 players with the proper bandwidth.

Read full topic

item.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)
item.dc:creator: @12igon8 12igon8
item.description:
@12igon8 wrote:

then a 1gb server culd possibly host 45 players for you…dont take my word on that though

Read full topic

item.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)
item.dc:creator: @Wafflenat3r Wafflenat3r
item.description:
@Wafflenat3r wrote:

I got a straight up 317 Hyperion based server. No customs or crap like that. Just a straight up server that will hopfully match that of the old, or at least before they came out with Bounty Hunter.

Read full topic

item.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)
item.dc:creator: @12igon8 12igon8
item.description:
@12igon8 wrote:

lol, it really all depends, like i said in the guide, if you have customs, how much you got on your server, it all is different. Soz i couldnt help that much =S

Read full topic

item.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)
item.dc:creator: @Wafflenat3r Wafflenat3r
item.description:
@Wafflenat3r wrote:

I just did

A 1gb vps can host about 38 players with no lagg.
(12igon8)

Is all of the information I could get out of it that was useful to me. I have to know how much load the server will be on the dedi. Not what kinds of a VPS I should buy. I cannot afford such a thing.

[center]Works Cited
“12igon8” ULTIMATE VPS GUIDE WITH PICS. March 14, 2010
[size=4pt]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429240.0.html[/size][/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)

yes, why dont you read my vps guide, its like 1 only vps guide out there on moparscape

item.title: Purchasing Server Hosting (Not Asking)
item.dc:creator: @Wafflenat3r Wafflenat3r
item.description:
@Wafflenat3r wrote:

♠Cameron♠ says: Do you have any idea the server load of a RSPS? Kloplop321 says: Pretty heavy if the server is running in java ♠Cameron♠ says: Really? I am purchasing some hosting not a full dedi but my buddy is giving me hosting space on his Dedi He needs to know how much it'll take so he can give me a price estimate. Kloplop321 says: Why don't you do a trial run

So far I am not getting thrilling results from my questions. I have a good idea either the server will be laggy as fuck… Or it will be VERY expensive.

Perhaps I should just go with a $24 VPS?

RS-1024MB - RAM: 1024MB dedicated, 1536MB burstable Space: 40GB dedicated space Bandwidth: 500GB of premium bandwidth

Read full topic

that doesn’t sound like such a good idea…
